item.description:
In continued celebration of the centennial for Mark Twain, we have scheduled a group trip to the Mark Twain House & Museum!

This looks to be a very interesting and entertaining location, with a full museum with many artifacts and special presentations to celebrate the centennial. We will have a tour provided by an expert from the museum.

Check out their new website:
http://www.marktwainh...

The Mark Twain House & Museum is located in Hartford, CT, so you can either travel there and meet us, or you can join us for breakfast at 10:30am and then all pile into a few cars to reduce the need to take a bunch of vehicles. The Museum is about an hour and a half away from Worcester, so please be sure to book enough time to get there.

10:30am - breakfast at NU Cafe in Worcester (http://www.nucafe.com...)
11:30am - leave Worcester
01:00pm - arrive at the Mark Twain House & Museum

UPDATE:
We hit our goal of at least 10 people, so the price is $11 per person!
item.name: Humanist Excursion - Mark Twain House & Museum - PLEASE READ DETAILS
